title: Touching the ground with your nose
transcript: yes the the the one that told you that the nose should touch the ground is mandatory he is uh saying the truth the Hadith of the prophet in the he tells us that I was commanded I was ordered and instructed to prostrate on seven parts of the body the head and he pointed to his forehead and to the nose so this means that it is part of the thing that we should do and Allah Knows Best
